file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug791.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_791_SON/bug791.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug791.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug791.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_791_SON/bug791.cir.prn )
